name: Don't Forget: The Games
description:
These are the game I made for Don't Forget. Well except  1505 and 1504 are not games in made for Don't Forget. They are projects I made before it, but I let's played them, so here!

If I forgot something, tell me it somehow, I'll add it!

If you wanna record yourself playing them, a link to here would be nice or simply say the channel name, but saying the game name, the itch.io name and that it's on itch.io is alright. I do the same!
